songs.title: La brise
songs.lyrics:
[Hook]
Ride around en drop top screaming out fuck the world
Mes mains sur le volant, my mind on my money
Still screamin' out fuck the world
Ride around en drop top screaming out fuck the world
Mes mains sur le volant, my mind on my money
Still screamin' out fuck the world

[Verse 1]
Ok, ok
Ride around en drop top screaming out fuck the world
Imma throw a fucking rant si les choses elles vont pas comme je veux
So what you say now?
One shot, one deal, fuck around, tu te fais take out
J'get super wasted in an all black Benz
And I watch the city fade out
What you know about the type of shit that we on
Aeon Flux, yeah le genre de chicks that we on
On fait les bad moves, that'll be on us
Mais d'ici là, on reach pour les billions
R.Kelly, fuck boys get peed on, ton shit est bidon
Move a kilo on a d-low, cock back reload
Fuck that, where my hustlers at? Où sont mes nice girls?
Où sont mes fly dudes? Où sont mes bad goons?
Yes

[Hook]
Ride around en drop top screaming out fuck the world
Mes mains sur le volant, my mind on my money
Still screamin' out fuck the world
Ride around en drop top screaming out fuck the world
Mes mains sur le volant, my mind on my money
Still screamin' out fuck the world

[Verse 2]
Ah
Ride around en bus down hooptie, nobody can touch me
Shoutout à mes vendeurs, faut ce qu'il faut
Man, il faut garder les costies
One shot, one deal, fuck around, tu te fais take out (ouh)
J'get super wasted in an all black Benz
And I watch the city  fade out
What you know about the type of shit that you don't know about?
Shut the fuck up, man c'est moi qui parle
You see me ridin' in a Kia on my way to Re-up
I can't see you, can't see you comme un myope
Yeah we up, you get beat up
Fly señorita with the 9 millimeter
Let me beat it dans la New Beetle
Two bitches,  you wish
Lary Kidd on that new-ish
Fais comme chez vous, bitch (ouh)

[Hook]
Ride around en drop top screaming out fuck the world
Mes mains sur le volant, my mind on my money
Still screamin' out fuck the world
Ride around en drop top screaming out fuck the world
Mes mains sur le volant, my mind on my money
Still screamin' out fuck the world

[Outro]
Contrôle
Contrôle, contrôle, contrôle
One shot, one deal, fuck around, tu t'fais take out
J'get super wasted in an all black Benz
And I watch the city fade out
Fuck around, fuck around, tu t'fais take out
J'get super wasted in an all black Benz
And I watch the city fade out
